author: Staff Reporter
text: V. Radhika, mother of Rohith Vemula, was sent to Continental hospital on Sunday evening, after she complained of chest pain. She had earlier visited the University of Hyderabad (UoH) Health Centre, where an ECG test was done. A medical officer from the varsity said that she is a diabetic and had gone to the private hospital for an evaluation with the cardiologist.
title: Rohit’s mother hospitalised
